Frequently Asked Questions

Find answers to common questions about our music curation services.

How does your music curation service work?+
We start with a discovery call to understand your brand, space, and audience. Based on this, we design custom playlists or sonic strategies tailored to your needs.
What types of venues do you work with?+
We work with hotels, restaurants, bars, retail stores, wellness centers, events, and any space that values atmosphere and guest experience.
Do you offer one-time services or ongoing partnerships?+
Both! We can create a one-time playlist package or become your long-term music partner with regular updates and seasonal refreshes.
How long does it take to receive our first playlist?+
Typically 1-2 weeks after our initial consultation, depending on the complexity of your needs.

SensEar Music Curation G.P. is a registered company in the E.U. operating in Athens, Greece (Registration No. ELGEMI: 163951803000). The company is authorized and regulated by the Corporate Registry (GEMI) and governed by Greek commercial and corporate law, as handled through the Athens Chamber of Tradesmen. All consulting services provided by SensEar adhere to Greek and E.U. regulations, ensuring compliance and ethical business practices.
